name: minnesotan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Minnesota: The championship was won by a Minnesotan. The 54-year-old Minnesotan was questioned by the FBI.
More examplesFewer examplesThe average Minnesotan earns about $47,240.Education is something Minnesotans care a lot about.Nine out of 10 Minnesotans are white.

belonging or relating to the US state of Minnesota or its people: She returned to her home town, a northern Minnesotan mining community. the snow of a Minnesotan winter
More examplesFewer examplesThe building is built from sand-coloured Minnesotan stone.There are a number of artists whose beginnings are inseparable from their Minnesotan roots.The obsessive issue in Minnesotan politics is opposition to abortion.
